title: Vallow children go missing, mommy and new hubby found in luxury Hawaii resort.
itunes:title: Vallow children go missing, mommy and new hubby found in luxury Hawaii resort.
description:
After months of searching, authorities located the mother of two children who disappeared in September. Lori Vallow, dubbed the "Doomsday cult" mother is in Hawaii. Her two missing children are still unaccounted for.

Where are the children?

Joining Nancy to discuss:

  • Jason Oshins: New York Defense Attorney
  • Bobby Chacon: Former Special Agent FBI, current star of FB Watch Series "Curse of Akakor" 
  • Dr. Bethany Marshall: Psychoanalyst, Beverly Hills,
  • Karen Smith: Los Angeles Forensics Expert, Lecturer at the University of Florida, Host of "Shattered Souls" podcast
  • Nate Eaton: Reporter for East Idaho News

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
